articles.author: Juan Montes
articles.title: The Country That Is Helping Tens of Thousands of Migrants Head to the U.S. - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Nicaragua’s open-border policy for U.S.-bound asylum seekers provides bridge for Haitians, Cubans and Africans to reach southern border
articles.content: President Daniel Ortega has opened Nicaragua to flights carrying tens of thousands of migrants from Haiti, Cuba and Africa in recent months, swelling the ranks of people using the Central American co… [+393 chars]
